newsitem.title: USA: Goldman cuts Whole Foods stake to 6.7 pct.
newsitem.headline: Goldman cuts Whole Foods stake to 6.7 pct.

text.p: An investor group including Goldman Sachs & Co said Tuesday it cuts its stake in Whole Foods Market Inc to 6.7 percent, or 1,297,951 common shares.

In a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the group also reported that Goldman's designee to Whole Foods Market's board of directors resigned from the board last week. The group said it waived its right to designate a director to the board of Whole Foods.
The group said it sold 265,000 shares of the company's stock between May 15 and June 12 at prices ranging from $29.00 to $30.00 a share.
